body:
> **Note that this is the first version of the tracer to offer support for Node.js v24.**
> With this version you'll need to set `--no-async-context-frame` either using a CLI argument or via `NODE_OPTIONS` as a workaround. In a future release when we complete Node.js v24 support this workaround will no longer be needed.

* \[[`fcf95b27a8`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/fcf95b27a8)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** simpler adding --no-async-context-frame (Bryan English) [#5717](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5717)
* \[[`87fcd71d12`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/87fcd71d12)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** fix child\_process test on node 24 (Bryan English) [#5722](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5722)
* \[[`7806a574ff`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/7806a574ff)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Add minimal fast path for esm being enabled (Ruben Bridgewater) [#5601](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5601)
* \[[`5153ea6466`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/5153ea6466)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** Add new baggage APIs which act on currently active baggage (Ida Liu) [#5365](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5365)
* \[[`fd0750c1b5`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/fd0750c1b5)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Pin shared pipeline (TonyCTHsu) [#5713](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5713)
* \[[`f3cb875333`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f3cb875333)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** Node.js 24 support (Bryan English) [#5678](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5678)
* \[[`af5717ecc2`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/af5717ecc2)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Fix OOM tests flakiness (Nicolas Savoire) [#5590](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5590)
* \[[`f4ee8443bf`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f4ee8443bf)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** use no async context frame option for now (Bryan English) [#5706](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5706)
* \[[`9702e5bb23`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/9702e5bb23)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** Bump taint tracking package (Carles Capell) [#5701](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5701)
* \[[`8ca6920ff2`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/8ca6920ff2)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Skip app-dir app in nextjs 13.2 test in node 24 (#5691) (Ugaitz Urien) [#5699](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5699)
* \[[`ed02dd9d75`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/ed02dd9d75)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Add debug logs when starting/stopping the CDP session (Thomas Watson) [#5694](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5694)
* \[[`6e4b4641b8`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/6e4b4641b8)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** \[test-optimization] \[SDTEST-1983] Add commit sha to request of Test Management (Mario Vidal Domínguez) [#5688](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5688)
* \[[`2c5fb90f5c`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/2c5fb90f5c)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Slight improvement to script-matching algorithm (Thomas Watson) [#5695](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5695)
* \[[`5e899cb114`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/5e899cb114)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** re-enable release proposal dont-land-on checks (Roch Devost) [#5665](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5665)
* \[[`3e3d7d6ded`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/3e3d7d6ded)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** Update pprof-nodejs to 5.8.0 (Nicolas Savoire) [#5693](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5693)
* \[[`f13861a1f3`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f13861a1f3)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** **tracing**: add support for @confluentinc/kafka-javascript (William Conti) [#5489](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5489)
* \[[`d6df5c1606`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/d6df5c1606)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** manual keep trace on asm standalone and api security (Ilyas Shabi) [#5649](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5649)
* \[[`f3cf426fd1`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f3cf426fd1)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Fix tests in Node.js 24 (Thomas Watson) [#5689](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5689)
* \[[`052bdaae4a`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/052bdaae4a)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Fix Node 24 warning for invoking fs.existsSync with invalid argument type (Attila Szegedi) [#5687](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5687)
* \[[`8d6b823ffe`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/8d6b823ffe)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** **fix**: Support for inode when /proc/self/cgroup is a multiline string (Ruben Bridgewater) [#5683](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5683)
* \[[`edde8b566b`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/edde8b566b)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** remove async resource usage from dns/fs/net integrations (Roch Devost) [#5673](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5673)
* \[[`56b04d0140`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/56b04d0140)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Add a fake agent for code hotspots and timeline tests too. (Attila Szegedi) [#5667](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5667)
* \[[`c2f57b8ce0`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/c2f57b8ce0)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** **fix(vitest)**: fix coverage not being reported when value is zero (Ruben Bridgewater) [#5681](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5681)
* \[[`3e85c09fb4`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/3e85c09fb4)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** fix rasp ssrf flaky test (Ilyas Shabi) [#5659](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5659)
* \[[`f2b167d343`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f2b167d343)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** **tracing**: add support for pg cursors / streams (William Conti) [#5680](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5680)
* \[[`daf4277f3e`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/daf4277f3e)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** **fix(llmobs)**: llmobs data can be sent to agent proxy running on uds (Sam Brenner) [#5679](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5679)
* \[[`4031dd25ea`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/4031dd25ea)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Remove unused dev dependencies (Ilyas Shabi) [#5668](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5668)
* \[[`c8a06cd9b9`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/c8a06cd9b9)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** Improve log safety (Ruben Bridgewater) [#5631](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5631)
* \[[`c0d30aeafe`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/c0d30aeafe)] - **(SEMVER-MINOR)** Upgrade `attempt_to_fix` to `v3` (Mario Vidal Domínguez) [#5670](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5670)
* \[[`f9b709b11b`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/f9b709b11b)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** _**Revert**_ "node action default version" (Roch Devost) [#5675](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5675)
* \[[`9721d0895f`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/9721d0895f)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** switch to default github token for ci visibility benchmark (Roch Devost) [#5639](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5639)
* \[[`b1727dd9bf`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/b1727dd9bf)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[Code Origin for Spans] Allow code origin to be disabled (Thomas Watson) [#5635](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5635)
* \[[`54c86664a9`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/54c86664a9)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** use a fixed version for latest in node action (Roch Devost) [#5671](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5671)
* \[[`108c0b4fba`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/108c0b4fba)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** fix release proposal not closing patch pr on minor (Roch Devost) [#5663](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5663)

[SDTEST-1983]: https://datadoghq.atlassian.net/browse/SDTEST-1983?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNWRkNTljNzYxNjVmNDY3MDlhMDU5Y2ZhYzA5YTRkZjUiLCJwIjoiZ2l0aHViLWNvbS1KU1cifQ
